transArray.content: The service is very good. Real experience. The hotel is clean and satisfied.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. The hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road, only 200 meters away from Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, and the transportation is convenient. We are glad to see your positive recognition of our hygiene and service in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. We will continue to work hard and continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe that you will stay with us next time You will get a better stay experience. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy holiday! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
